entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 11.0°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
